Quality and style were awesome! Fit Dad perfect. Very classy looking.

This limited review is for the Full Zip Sweater Vest. Upon initial inspection noted a number of seams where the threads were loose or at least ends hanging out.  See a few example photos. There were enough instances where I did not feel comfortable just trimming and keeping the vest. Returned without wearing.  The vest has many good Amazon reviews. This was hopefully an isolated quality issue.
Feels fine just a bit thinner than I expected.
My Love says it fits perfectly 😍
For the price I expected a denser fleece.
fit was perfect.
I bought this for the house to use instead of my hoodie. I like it very much well worth the cost. I use long sleeve Flannel Shirt and sometimes all I need is something to keep my back worm.

Like some others have said their sizing is just weird and off. It doesn’t match any other brand that I buy. The XL was super tight then the XXL was a parachute. It just seems like poor quality control. Luck of the draw on getting one the right dimensions.

Nice multi-pocket features
I ordered this vest and use it with a hoodie and I love it it’s a nice vest

This runs a little small, so ordered a size larger than usual.  It is lighter than I thought which was a pleasant surprise because I was looking for a light vest.  I got at a great price of under $25.  When I went back in a couple of days to get another, it was $36.  Not sure it is competitive at this price.

I was a bit skeptical when I first ordered it thinking it would either be too small or slightly too big (as many others I've ordered have been), but this vest was just right. And it's actually of higher quality than I was expecting. For anyone looking for a quality vest for those somewhat cool autumn nights or brisk spring mornings, this is definitely the vest for you. Very well pleased with it.

评论概述: Nice vest but very boxy fit
评论详情: Decent vest, especially for the money.  My only complaint is that it is very boxy fitting- no taper to it at all.  I'm not exactly skinny and there is a bit too much room in the waste area.  Shoulders/chest fit well.  I'm 6'0" and 200 lbs and went with a large.

评论概述: Runs large well made god price
评论详情: Runs large as compared to other vests I own Well made Good price

评论概述: Quality product at a reasonable price
评论详情: Considering the price I paid, it might be the best product I've bought all year. Excellent quality and well finished.
Only issue is that it zips up on the wrong side.  Takes getting used to.  Once it is zipped, it is not an issue.
Very nice fit, quality and color. Nice touches make this feel like a $75 vest. I just wish they had them in other colors because I would buy 3 to 4 more easily. Great price!

评论概述: Good at first, then fabric started to pill
评论详情: I cycle between a few fleece vests during the winter, but I stopped wearing this one when the fabric started to pill. The heather grey color seems to make the pilling more noticeable. I'd pay more for a product with higher quality fabric.
I am 5'7" male, 180lbs. The large fits nicely.
Cant beat for the money ,has a much more expensive look than price reflects.great vest especially fir the money, a definite buy.
Excellent 👍🏼

Love this vest.  Very happy with it.  The inside is smooth and comfy.  Pockets have zippers.  Nice fit.  Great price.  Only negative is that it has a women's zipper - i.e. the part on the zipper that you move up and down is on the opposite side that a guy would expect.  But it is well made regardless.

I wasn't sure about this vest for the price, but when it arrived, I was surprised.  The construction seems decent and the materials no different than the more expensive brands at the store.  I'm a 42 or 44 in a suit coat, and the large fits me well.  I' 5'8" and the length is at just fine.  Well worth the money.
Quality vest. Zipper on opposite side as normal for men, but can deal with that.
It's a warm combination of materials but it's light weight. The trimming is nice and it lays well on the body. These type of non-elastic bottoms are my favorite. No complaints.
The XL was just a little small in this brand.  Nice weight, nice vest
Great looking vest that was exactly as advertised.  Great alternative to a fleece vest.  Highly recommended.
Awesome vest! Not too heavy or light, but the perfect weight. Really can’t beat it!
Nice, but fits smaller. I suggest buying a size bigger.  Thanks.
